column5: Hello fellow OFC'ers. Yesterday all of a sudden I have to click on each reply to a post in order to read it.  WHY? When I click on a post, it shows only the initial one and at the bottom it has links to all of the replies.  THis is obviously a Pain in the @$$.  Did I do something here??  How do I fix this?  Thanks all!
click options in here, down to display modes and click standard.
Fixed!!!  Thanks very much!! Life is normal again.
Haha, yea that happened to me on Dootalk, it sucked.
hmmmm, glad you askd that, ive gone to OFC on other computers and seen that and was perplexed  THanks
It often happens if you come across a thread through google.  I guess it's a more suitable format for search engines but clicking through it will change your settings to it.
